COMMENT_TX: ej,fox-n101,C,ashfe901,Balls and strikes $Senators coach Fox ejected by HP umpire Ashford for arguing ball 4 to Bradford
ej,blefc101,P,stevj901,Bench jockeying Curt Blefary ejected by HP umpire Johnny Stevens

$Twins SS Cesar Tovar and LF Rich Reese stumbled around the ball boy in the LF corner; Twins manager Cal Ermer argued that the boy interfered with his players but 3B umpire John Rice said that the boy did not intentionally get in the way; Ermer was not ejected

ej,ermec101,M,odomj901,Balk reversal ej,reesr101,P,odomj901,Balk reversal (threw towel) $Twins manager Ermer and pinch-hitter Reese ejected by HP umpire Odom for reversing balk call when Chicago pointed that Tovar was not in batter's box when balk was called; umpires agreed and reversed it; Reese threw towel on field
$Voss made great over the shoulder catch and crashed into the wall; he had to leave the game
